name: Dino Swamp: Jurassic Kingdom
description:
The Jurassic Age was a tough time! The territories were full of huge dinosaurs and that's exactly where the adventure starts for you.
Select your favorite dino and get yourself out there to acomplish your only mission: Becoming the king of the swamp.
Just go across the landscape and show the other prehistoric monsters who is the one in charge. It won't be an easy path, either a short one.
Remember you can't just force the other inhabitants of the swamp to respect you as their leader, you'll have to walk near them, but don't crash into them!
Nobody would like that and you could just get attacked or biten by other opponent! Will you achieve your goal?

GAME HIGHLIGHTS:
- Daily Rewards
- 7 Unlockable Dinos
- Multiple levels
- Custom Difficulty
- Custom Weather
- 4 Unlockable Game Modes
